meta.subtitulo: Creation a Single Page Application for a To Do list with Express

resumo.p: This project consists on doing the same app of the previous homework, but now with Express.
The data layer will remain the same.
The application will be created with Node.js and Express.
All the GET and POST methods of the app, will be dealt with on the routes folder.
The requests to the data layer will be done on the controllers folder.
All the views for the app will be done with the help of pug templates and are present on the views folder.
The public folder contains all the static files for the app.
The bin folder contains the file responsible to start the app.
All the app funcionalites remain the same.

resultados.resultado: File responsible to deal with all requests
